content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, please wait a moment.
I didn't see you yesterday, and I was thinking...{短暂停}
Oh, it's nothing important.
info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日第二天-1004夙夜_特殊反馈及引入语

content: This may be a bit late, {短暂停} but I wanted to wish you a happy birthday. May each and every day be filled with energy and vitality.
info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日第二天-1004夙夜_特殊反馈及引入语

content: <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, I'm sorry I forgot about your birthday. I only found out from the other Neighbors that yesterday was your special day.

content:
I believe... I remember yesterday was your birthday, (embarrassed)
Happy...{短暂停}Birthday!
I hope it's not too late.
